Title: Sr. Associate - Projects
Description: Job Summary We are seeking a Sr. Developer with 4 to 8 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in AWS CloudFormation ML Ops AWS Machine Learning Docker AI & ML Concepts Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence Amazon Sagemaker Kubernetes Terraform and GIT. Experience in the Bioinformatics domain is mandatory. This role is based in our office and operates during day shifts. Responsibilities Develop and maintain scalable machine learning models using AWS Machine Learning and Amazon Sagemaker. Implement and manage infrastructure as code using AWS CloudFormation and Terraform. Design and deploy containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes. Collaborate with bioinformatics experts to integrate AI and ML solutions into bioinformatics workflows. Optimize machine learning pipelines for performance and scalability. Ensure the security and compliance of machine learning models and data. Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers and team members. Conduct code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices in software development. Utilize GIT for version control and collaborative development. Implement ML Ops practices to streamline the deployment and monitoring of machine learning models. Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI ML and bioinformatics. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to machine learning models and infrastructure. Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes and tools. Qualifications Possess a strong understanding of AWS CloudFormation and Terraform for infrastructure management. Demonstrate expertise in ML Ops and the deployment of machine learning models. Have hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes for container orchestration. Show proficiency in AI & ML concepts and their application in bioinformatics. Be skilled in using Amazon Sagemaker for developing and deploying machine learning models. Exhibit strong knowledge of GIT for version control. Have a background in bioinformatics and its related technologies. Be capable of working collaboratively in a team environment. Display excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Stay current with industry trends and advancements in AI and ML. Possess strong communication and documentation skills. Be detail-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality solutions. Have a proactive approach to learning and professional development. Certifications Required AWS Certified Machine Learning Docker Certified Associate Kubernetes Certification GIT Certification The Cognizant community: We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Title: PBI Developer
Description: Job Summary We are seeking a skilled Developer with 3 to 5 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Spark in Scala Azure Data Lake Store Azure DevOps Python Databricks SQL Databricks Workflows and PySpark. Additionally experience in the Bioinformatics domain is mandatory. This role requires working from the office during day shifts with no travel required. Responsibilities Develop and maintain scalable data pipelines using Spark in Scala to process large datasets efficiently. Utilize Azure Data Lake Store to manage and store large volumes of structured and unstructured data. Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps to ensure seamless integration and deployment of applications. Write efficient and reusable code in Python to support various data processing and analysis tasks. Leverage Databricks SQL to perform complex queries and data transformations for analytical purposes. Design and manage Databricks Workflows to automate data processing tasks and ensure timely execution. Apply PySpark to process and analyze large datasets ensuring optimal performance and scalability. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver solutions that meet business needs. Conduct thorough testing and debugging of applications to ensure high-quality deliverables. Provide technical support and troubleshooting for data-related issues ensuring minimal downtime. Document technical specifications and maintain comprehensive records of development activities. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve skills and knowledge. Contribute to the overall success of the company by delivering high-quality data solutions that drive business growth. Qualifications Possess a strong understanding of Spark in Scala and its application in data processing. Demonstrate proficiency in Azure Data Lake Store for managing large datasets. Have hands-on experience with Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipeline implementation. Show expertise in Python programming for data analysis and processing. Be skilled in using Databricks SQL for complex data queries and transformations. Have experience in designing and managing Databricks Workflows for automated data processing. Exhibit proficiency in PySpark for handling large-scale data processing tasks. Have a background in Bioinformatics with a deep understanding of domain-specific data requirements. Be capable of collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver data solutions. Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Possess excellent communication skills for documenting technical specifications and development activities. Show a commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with industry trends. Be able to work independently and manage multiple tasks effectively. Certifications Required Azure Data Engineer Associate Databricks Certified Associate Developer for Apache Spark The Cognizant community: We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Title: Data Developer-DL
Description: Job Summary We are seeking a Sr. Developer with 4 to 8 years of experience in Power Apps Power BI SQL Server Analysis Services and other related technologies. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Bioinformatics and will work from our office during day shifts. This role involves developing and maintaining advanced data models and reports to support our bioinformatics initiatives. Responsibilities Develop and maintain advanced data models using Power BI to support bioinformatics projects. Create and optimize Power BI reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights. Utilize SQL Server Analysis Services to manage and analyze large datasets. Implement and maintain Power Apps solutions to streamline workflows. Leverage Power BI Service for report sharing and collaboration. Apply data modeling techniques to ensure data integrity and accuracy. Use Mash Up Language in Power BI to transform and clean data. Write and optimize DAX queries for complex calculations and data analysis. Integrate Azure Analysis Services for scalable data processing. Collaborate with bioinformatics teams to understand data requirements and deliver solutions. Utilize MS Excel for data analysis and reporting. Ensure data security and compliance with industry standards. Provide technical support and troubleshooting for Power BI and related tools. Continuously improve data processes and workflows to enhance efficiency. Stay updated with the latest advancements in Power BI and bioinformatics. Qualifications Possess a minimum of 4 years of experience in Power Apps Power BI and SQL Server Analysis Services. Demonstrate expertise in data modeling and DAX within Power BI. Have a strong understanding of bioinformatics and its data requirements. Show proficiency in using MS Excel for data analysis. Exhibit experience with Azure Analysis Services for scalable solutions. Display knowledge of Mash Up Language for data transformation. Be skilled in SQL and database management. Have excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities. Show strong communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams. Be detail-oriented with a focus on data accuracy and integrity. Demonstrate the ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks. Stay committed to continuous learning and professional development. Have a proactive approach to improving data processes and workflows. Title: Chief Gen AI Architect (remote)
Description: This remote position is open to any qualified applicant in the United States. It is preferred that a qualified candidate is local to Chicago, Illinois, and they must be open to travel. *Please note, this role is not able to offer visa transfer or sponsorship now or in the future* Practice - AIA - Artificial Intelligence and Analytics About AI & Analytics: Artificial intelligence (AI) and the data it collects and analyzes will soon sit at the core of all intelligent, human-centric businesses. By decoding customer needs, preferences, and behaviors, our clients can understand exactly what services, products, and experiences their consumers need. Within AI & Analytics, we work to design the future—a future in which trial-and-error business decisions have been replaced by informed choices and data-supported strategies! By applying AI and data science, we help leading companies to prototype, refine, validate, and scale their AI and analytics products and delivery models! Cognizant’s AIA practice takes insights that are buried in data and provide businesses with a clear way to transform how they source, interpret, and consume their information. Our clients need flexible data structures and a streamlined data architecture that quickly turns data resources into informative, meaningful intelligence. Job Duties and Responsibilities: A successful candidate will be responsible for leading the practice’s ambitious growth initiative with our most strategic cloud partners – Azure, AWS, and GCP. This opportunity is scoped for high-performing, high-potential subject matter experts who are self-directed, entrepreneurial, highly collaborative, organized, diligent, and thoughtful. Lead solution architecture for new business development and drive end-to-end implementation and deployment. Run the solution architecture and proposal defense for reactive and proactive proposal responses for solutions on Generative AI (especially LLMs), Conversational AI & cloud AIaaS. Provide leadership for the transformation of customer requirements into visions, strategies, and roadmaps to implement Design Artificial Intelligence solutions and Data Science services platforms at the enterprise scale. Independently lead client design workshops and provide tradeoffs and recommendations. Develop and implement applications using advanced Generative AI models such as OpenAI GPT, Anthropic Clude, Google Plam2, Meta Llama2, focusing on enhancing developer and business productivity. Architect solutions incorporating sophisticated techniques like Retrieval Augmented Generation, In-context Memory, Transformer Architectures, and Hierarchical Models, ensuring optimal model performance and scalability. Apply frameworks such as LangChain and Llama Index for efficient indexing, retrieval, and chaining of language models, enhancing the contextual understanding and response generation of applications. Integrate multiple components such as data processing, machine learning models, and feedback mechanisms to address architectural challenges and ensure detailed deployment. Stay on top of emerging trends, sophisticated patterns, dependencies in data, and advancements in AI architecture, supplying to the refinement and innovation of application development processes. Explore and implement inference techniques in generative AI for making predictions or generating new data based on observed input. Give to the Cognizant cloud community by developing assets, thought leadership, etc. Position Qualifications: At least 18 years of experience. Strong expertise in the Data & AI architecture for one of the hyperscaler partners –Azure, AWS, GCP Hands-on programming skill in at least one language node.js. Expert on Cloud competencies on “Artificial Intelligence” and “Machine Learning” PaaS components: Contextual Conversation design– for personalized and humanized interaction with end user for complex business cases: Microsoft BOT service Google DialogFlow EX, Amazon Lex Natural Language Processing model - design, training and publishing for multiple languages Project experience and/or skills Certification with generative AI: Azure Open AI (GPT 3.5/4) Google PaLM 2 AWS Bedrocks Emotion and Sentiment Analytics Custom Speech model - Speech-to-text and Voice synthesis calibrated for language, accent, pitch, tone, noise, and business vocabs. Omni-Channel Integration for AI through Direct line Deployment and publish for AI and ML services with ACR, ACI, Docker, Azure Kubernetes Azure/ AWS/ GCP certifications in Machine Learning & AI: Microsoft DP 100, AI 102 AWS Machine Learning Specialty Google Certified Cloud Machine Learning Engineer Deeplearning.ai certifications on LLMs, prompt engineering Holistic knowledge of Solution Architecture, including “Data Analytics,” “Data Security,” “Dev Ops” & “ML Ops”: Web app and services – Microservices, Azure functions, Logic apps, API management DevOps CI/CD pipeline on Cloud – “GitHub for Enterprise” Ability to compare technologies in any layer objectively with evaluation criteria and considerations. Excellent communication skills, preparing PowerPoint presentations, and executive readouts. Salary and Other Compensation: Applications will be accepted until 15 Nov 2024. The annual salary for this position is between $165,000 - $250,000 depending on experience and other qualifications of the successful candidate. This position is also eligible for Cognizant’s discretionary annual incentive program and stock awards, based on performance and is subject to the terms of Cognizant’s applicable plans. Benefits: Cognizant offers the following benefits for this position, subject to applicable eligibility requirements: Medical/Dental/Vision/Life Insurance Paid holidays plus Paid Time Off 401(k) plan and contributions Long-term/Short-term Disability Paid Parental Leave Employee Stock Purchase Plan Disclaimer: The salary, other compensation, and benefits information is accurate as of the date of this posting. Cognizant reserves the right to modify this information at any time, subject to applicable law. #LI-AY1 #CB #Ind123 The Cognizant community: We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Title: Wireless Network Engineer
Description: Job Summary We are seeking an experienced App Security Specialist with 5 to 8 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in various key management and data protection technologies as well as domain experience in Billing and Revenue Management. This role is based in our office and operates during day shifts. The candidate will play a crucial role in ensuring the security and integrity of our applications and data. Responsibilities Implement and manage security measures for applications using Thales CCKM Imperva Cloud Data Protection and GCP HSM. Oversee the deployment and maintenance of Fortanix KMaaS Azure HSM and Akeyless solutions. Provide expertise in Google Cloud Key Management and Cloud Key Management Service to secure sensitive data. Utilize AWS Secret Manager and AWS Key Management Service to manage and protect cryptographic keys. Administer Azure Key Vault and Hashicorp Vault for secure storage and management of secrets. Ensure data protection using Google Data Protection and AWS CloudHSM. Collaborate with the Billing and Revenue Management team to integrate security measures into their processes. Conduct regular security assessments and audits to identify vulnerabilities and implement corrective actions. Develop and maintain security policies procedures and documentation. Provide training and support to team members on security best practices and tools. Monitor and respond to security incidents and breaches in a timely manner. Stay updated with the latest security trends technologies and regulatory requirements. Contribute to the overall security strategy and roadmap of the organization. Qualifications Possess a minimum of 5 years of experience in application security and key management. Demonstrate expertise in Thales CCKM Imperva Cloud Data Protection and GCP HSM. Have hands-on experience with Fortanix KMaaS Azure HSM and Akeyless. Show proficiency in Google Cloud Key Management and Cloud Key Management Service. Be skilled in using AWS Secret Manager and AWS Key Management Service. Have experience with Azure Key Vault and Hashicorp Vault. Be knowledgeable in Google Data Protection and AWS CloudHSM. Have domain experience in Billing and Revenue Management. Exhibit strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Possess excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Be detail-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Stay current with industry trends and best practices in application security. Hold relevant certifications in key management and data protection technologies. Certifications Required Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP) AWS Certified Security - Specialty The Cognizant community: We are a high caliber team who appreciate and support one another. Title: Wireless Network Engineer
Description: Job Summary We are seeking an experienced App Security Specialist with 5 to 8 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive technical skills in various key management services and cloud data protection tools. The role involves ensuring the security of our applications and data particularly in the domain of Billing and Revenue Management. This is a work-from-office position with day shifts and no travel requirements. Responsibilities Oversee the implementation and management of Thales CCKM to ensure secure key management. Provide expertise in Imperva Cloud Data Protection to safeguard sensitive data across cloud environments. Utilize GCP HSM to manage cryptographic keys and enhance data security. Implement Fortanix KMaaS for robust key management as a service. Manage Azure HSM to ensure secure key storage and management. Leverage Akeyless for secure and scalable key management solutions. Utilize Google Cloud Key Management to protect data and manage encryption keys. Implement Cloud Key Management Service for secure key management across cloud platforms. Manage AWS Secret Manager to securely store and manage secrets. Utilize AWS Key Management Service for secure key management and encryption. Implement Azure Key Vault to safeguard cryptographic keys and secrets. Leverage Hashicorp Vault for secure secret management and data protection. Utilize Google Data Protection tools to ensure data security and compliance. Manage AWS CloudHSM to provide secure key storage and cryptographic operations. Ensure the security of billing and revenue management systems through effective key management and data protection. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate security measures into application development and deployment. Conduct regular security assessments and audits to identify and mitigate vulnerabilities. Provide training and support to team members on key management and data protection best practices. Stay updated with the latest security trends and technologies to continuously improve security measures. Develop and maintain security policies and procedures to ensure compliance with industry standards. Monitor security systems and respond to incidents to minimize impact and ensure quick resolution. Prepare and present security reports to management highlighting key findings and recommendations. Work closely with stakeholders to understand security requirements and implement appropriate solutions. Ensure all security measures align with the companys overall security strategy and objectives. Contribute to the companys mission by ensuring the security and integrity of critical data and applications. Title: Infra Solution Manager
Description: Job Summary We are seeking an experienced App Security Architect with 8 to 10 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive knowledge in various cloud key management services and data protection technologies. This role requires working from the office during day shifts and does not involve travel. The candidate will play a crucial role in securing our applications and ensuring data protection across multiple cloud platforms. Responsibilities Design and implement robust security architectures for applications across various cloud platforms. Oversee the integration of Thales CCKM Imperva Cloud Data Protection and GCP HSM into existing systems. Provide expertise in Fortanix KMaaS Azure HSM and Akeyless to enhance data security measures. Ensure the secure management of keys using Google Cloud Key Management and Cloud Key Management Service. Utilize AWS Secret Manager and AWS Key Management Service to protect sensitive information. Implement and manage Azure Key Vault and Hashicorp Vault for secure storage solutions. Lead the deployment of Google Data Protection and AWS CloudHSM to safeguard data. Collaborate with development teams to ensure security best practices are followed. Conduct regular security assessments and audits to identify vulnerabilities. Develop and maintain security policies and procedures. Provide training and guidance to team members on security protocols. Stay updated with the latest security trends and technologies. Contribute to the companys overall security strategy and objectives. Qualifications Possess a minimum of 8 years of experience in application security architecture. Demonstrate proficiency in Thales CCKM Imperva Cloud Data Protection and GCP HSM. Have hands-on experience with Fortanix KMaaS Azure HSM and Akeyless. Show expertise in Google Cloud Key Management and Cloud Key Management Service. Be skilled in using AWS Secret Manager and AWS Key Management Service. Have experience with Azure Key Vault and Hashicorp Vault. Be knowledgeable in Google Data Protection and AWS CloudHSM. Hold relevant certifications in cloud security and key management. Exhibit strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Possess excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Be detail-oriented and able to manage multiple tasks effectively. Show a commitment to continuous learning and professional development. Demonstrate a proactive approach to identifying and mitigating security risks.
